settings.label: Enable Application Mode
settings.info: This will enable progressive web application in your store.

settings.label: Application icon
settings.info: This icon will be used for the application icon on the home screen.

settings.label: Application maskable icon
settings.info: This icon needs to support a variety of shapes and must not have a background.

settings.label: Splash screen
settings.info: This image will be used as the splash screen when the application is launched.

settings.content: This enable a button to your store to install the application on the home screen of your customer's device.

settings.label: Shortcut icon
settings.info: This icon will be used for the application shortcut on the home screen.
